fields.label: Enable Messaging?
fields.name: enable_messaging
fields.instructions: Display a message that will appear site-wide.

fields.label: Message Assigments
fields.name: global_message_assignments
fields.instructions: Set any number of global messages. Please select the message type and location.

sub_fields.label: Start Date/Time
sub_fields.name: datetime_start
sub_fields.instructions: Set the message start date and time.

sub_fields.label: End Date/Time
sub_fields.name: datetime_end
sub_fields.instructions: Set the message end date and time.

sub_fields.label: Cookie Expiry
sub_fields.name: cookie_expiry
sub_fields.instructions: Set to zero to create a session cookie instead of time-based expiration.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Set the content of the message. Character Limit: 300.

sub_fields.label: Location
sub_fields.name: location
sub_fields.instructions: Determine where the modal will appear.

fields.label: Start Date/Time
fields.name: message_start
fields.instructions: Set the message start date and time.

fields.label: End Date/Time
fields.name: message_end
fields.instructions: Set the message end date and time.

fields.label: Cookie Expiry
fields.name: message_expiry
fields.instructions: Set to zero to create a session cookie instead of time-based expiry.

fields.label: Content
fields.name: message_content
fields.instructions: Set the content of the message. Character Limit: 300.

fields.label: Link
fields.name: message_link
fields.instructions: Set an optional link that will be appended to the end of your message content.
